title: War of the Roses: Mommy's Friend Jeffrey
description: Daniel is wondering if his girlfriend is cheating on him when she takes her kids to her sister's on Saturdays.  The reason for that is because one of her kids told him that they went to "mommy's friend Jeffrey's". Now he thinks she is saying she's going to her sister's as a cover-up for what she's really doing.
